proposal: Diving into the world of Balancer Grants and Treasury Reports, it's clear you're shaping the future of finance, one block at a time. With 3 holders in the ETH network, you're not just balancing; you're pioneering. Imagine enhancing this journey with our DEX or Lottery tools, where every community member can contribute and thrive. Let's build, not just for today, but for every wave that comes.
